body: @Ravenleaf LOL, why would they need to apply the logic of reality to the fantasy that they have made? its like saying authors of books like harry potter are also oblivious people...because they don't follow the law or logic of reality. Manga,doujin,novel are all for enjoyment and fantasy not to teach or etc the people reading it for logic of reality.
I know its in tons of manga/doujin, but it never ceases to amaze me how oblivious the authors think the world is.
